title: Outrage over Democrats’ video telling soldiers to refuse to follow illegal orders defies ‘basic morality’, says Ron Paul – live
summary: A former Republican congressman and presidential candidate is backing six Democratic lawmakers, highlighting concerns about the "illegal process" of U.S. military engagement. He emphasizes the need for reform in how the nation enters wars. This stance reflects a bipartisan call for accountability and oversight in military actions.

title: Manchester United 0-1 Everton: Premier League – as it happened
summary: Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall secured a significant victory for Everton amid dramatic circumstances. The team faced a setback when Idrissa Gueye was sent off for slapping a teammate. Despite the challenge, Everton managed to clinch the win.

title: Everton brush off bizarre Gueye red card to beat lethargic Manchester United
summary: Manchester United suffered a surprising 1-0 defeat to Everton, who played with 10 men after Idrissa Gueye received a red card for slapping teammate Michael Keane in the 13th minute. The loss highlights ongoing struggles for the Manchester side this season. Everton managed to secure the win despite being a man down.

title: US justice department renews request to unseal Epstein grand jury materials
summary: The Department of Justice contends that congressional action to release the Epstein files last week opens the door for unsealing associated court records. This move is seen as a crucial step towards transparency regarding the case. The DOJ's argument highlights the intersection of legislative and judicial processes in handling sensitive information.
